explains: n. <正式>重新开始，恢复；<法律>（土地、权利等的）重获

sentences.en: We are hoping for an early resumption of peace talks.
sentences.cn: 我们企盼着早日恢复和谈。

sentences.en: It is premature to speculate about the resumption of negotiations.
sentences.cn: 考虑谈判的恢复还太早。

sentences.en: The resumption of talks is indicative of an improving relationship between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 恢复谈判表明两国关系有所改善。
